label: 阿娑縛抄
本: The Seven Tengu Scrolls: Evil and the Rhetoric of Legitimacy in Medieval Japanese Buddhism . University of Hawai'i Press . 2012
説明文: The Asabashō (Notes on Buddhas, Bodhisattvas, and Diamond Halls of Womb Realm), an iconographic commentary of Tendai esoteric teachings from the mid-Kamakura.
